thread.title: 13 Jobs With Big Pay Raises in 2015
thread.title_full: 13 Jobs With Big Pay Raises in 2015

title: 13 Jobs With Big Pay Raises in 2015
text:
13 Jobs With Big Pay Raises in 2015 Written by: Laurie Kulikowski 09/22/15 - 7:00 AM EDT 
NEW YORK (TheStreet) -- America hasn't gotten a raise in a while. Wage increases have stalled over the past few years. This August was a bright spot, with hourly wages rising 0.3% versus the prior month (and up 2.2% versus the prior August), even while unemployment is at a seven-year low . August's tepid wage growth was seen as good news after a long period of stagnation. Still, it wasn't enough to spur an increase in interest rates from the Federal Reserve, which has been waiting on more robust growth. 
But just because America hasn't seen its collective paycheck goosed doesn't mean that some Americans aren't making more now than they were a year ago. It all depends on what kind of job you have. 
That's where Glassdoor, an online jobs review and listings site, comes in. Glassdoor culled its site for jobs that had the biggest pay raises in 2015. More Headlines
